title.value: Влияние аспарагиновой аминокислоты на лечение коров с послеродовым эндометритом
Influence aspartic amino acids on treatment of cows with postnatal endometritis
Influence aspartic amino acids on treatment of cows with postnatal endometritis

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Krasochko, P.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine
Snitko, T.V., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: Investigations on determination of the optimal dosage of the 4% suspension of aspartic amino acids in the treatment of endometritis in cows in conditions of microbiology and epizootology faculty of 'Grodno state agrarian university' and APK 'Koptevka' (Grodno district of the Grodno area) are carried out in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. An optimum dosage of a researched preparation - 15 ml as at use of such quantity of an acid had higher therapeutic effect (80%), increase in the percentage insemination of animals at the first hunting in the 23.3-27.5%, and reducing the service period (for 1-4 days it is less in comparison with the control).
